segments.text: I want to get in shape . I feel like a fence sitter-not really fat , but not really healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you mean . I fit into my clothes , but I'm not always comfortable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to get in shape together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about going to the gym ? There's one really close to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know the one you mean . Do you know how much the memberships are ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a matter of fact , they are having a promotion right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go after work and take a tour of the facilities .
segments.speaker: S2
